text: America has enemies in our homeland and
abroad 24 that's how many days michael
Flynn lasted as national security
advisor it's a record and not in a good
way it is indeed in on them 25 people
have held the post since it was created
by president eisenhower there was Henry
Kissinger who was in the role for more
than six years but the average tenure is
about 2.6 years president Trump's
cabinet members have a long way to go to
last as long as their predecessors this
chart here shows the average tenure of
cabinet members broken down by recent
presidents early resignations by advisor
are certainly not unprecedented Van
Jones who was Obama's special adviser on
green jobs resigned after just 179 days
amid controversy so what about Congress
representative trey radel holds the
modern record he resigned in 2014 after
serving just 389 days but Flynn looks
like a veteran compared to effingham
Lawrence he was a Democrat and he was
only in office for one day and that was
in eighteen seventy five
